m_szDocTitle: State of the Union pledge-by-pledge: has Obama kept his promises? | US news | The Guardian
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- State of the Union address State of the Union pledge-by-pledge: has Obama kept his promises? As Obama prepares for his final State of the Union speech , the Guardian has examined his previous major addresses to see how many of his pledges have been kept in 27 key policy areas Tuesday 12 January 2016 08.00 EST Last modified on Monday 13 June 2016 15.10 EDT Share on Messenger Healing America Guardian verdict: The implication then was that these challenges, though time-consuming, would eventually be met during his presidency. Instead, in previewing his final State
